attributes.action: Make Parents Responsible for their children(s) actions until adulthood (18yrs)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Parents should be held resposible for their childre until they attain the age of adulthood, currently 18 years of age.
Except in the case of children being married under this age.
Parents permission is required.

Whereby Parents are fined or imprisoned for their childrens illegal or anti-social activities.

Example: - 
Underage drinking.
Vandalism.
Antisocial behavour.
being abusive or threatening.
Then perhaps people would have more respect for others.

MAKE THE PARENTS RESPONSIBLE.

THIS WORKS IN OTHER COUNTRIES, WHY NOT HERE.
